question: Bayern Munich, which won the final of the FIFA Club World Cup in Qatar, is the football club of which country?
explanation:
Germany based professional football club Bayern Munich beat Mexicoâ€™s Tigres UANL in the final of the FIFA Club World Cup in Qatar.
This is the sixth title won by the club in less than nine months. Benjamin Pavard of the German team scored the only goal of the final match in the 59th minute.
